NO_DRIVER: No driver Found with this id.
NOT_A_DRIVER: User with provided id is not a driver.
ASSIGNED_TO_THIS: Driver is already assigned to this vehicle.
ASSIGNED_TO_ANOTHER: Driver is already assigned to another vehicle.
NO_VEHICLE: No vehicle Found with this id.
SAME_P_NO: Vehicle with the same plate number already exists
EMAIL_EXISTS: An account with this email already exists.
WRONG_CRED: Wrong email or password. Please try again.
DIFF_NEW_PASS: New password must be different from current password.
INVALID_REFRESH: Refresh token is invalid or expired.
INVALID_ACCESS: Access token is invalid or expired.
ROLE: Access denied. You are not allowed to view ths endpoint.
REFRESH_NOT_FOUND: Refresh token not found in cookies.
